mapper.select: select r,id,name,pw,nick,sort,snum,phone,tel,reg,email from (select rownum r,id,name,pw,nick,sort,snum,phone,tel,reg,email from member order by rownum desc) where r>=#{startNum} and #{endNum}>=r
select g.gn, count(g.gcode) from gu g, member m where g.gcode = m.gucode group by g.gn
select gcode,gn from admcd group by gcode
select count(*) from member where gcode=#{gcode}
